short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient way to save multiple links and text in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides a really easy way to store multiple links and texts into context menu (right-click menu) for quick access. CopyPaste360 makes pasting your links, text and content extremely convenient.
